vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καύχ-ησις, εως, ἡ,
boasting, [NT+4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
boasting, pride;
boasting, pride, glorying in; this can refer to proper or improper boasting, depending on the object of the boast; a later equivalent to καύχημαι, Rom. 3:27; 2Cor. 7:4, 14; 11:10
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 自誇
2) 自誇自豪的目標,原因 (林後 1:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 自夸
2) 自夸自豪的目标,原因 (林后 1:12)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự khoe khoang; sự tự hào
